item.title: How do i add something like - the owner (yournamehere) has logged in
item.dc:creator: @Infamous_Gangster Infamous Gangster
item.description:
@Infamous_Gangster wrote:

Add this into NPCHandler.Java

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 0000) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Mod Allstar")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Dissarmed Is Online"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Dissarmed Is Offline"; } } }
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 0000) {

0000 is the NPC ID.

Make sure you add the NPC ID into the Autospawn.CFG
